title: Jungle Walls don't exist
body: Anyone else walking through the buff walls? We were legit sitting in a wall as a 5 man for clash shenanigans and my Vayne condemn would not work on the walls of the buffs. Just shot enemies right through the walls. Enemy Ornn couldn't knockup on the either. This bug needs fixing as it makes fights super unpredictable and stops some abilities from working properly.

replies.body: Vandiril has a tutorial on how to walk through the walls as well. It's pretty broken lol
